StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerWaiverTypesForCategory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@O.cerWaiverCategoryID int)
AS
SELECT [WAIVER_TYPE_ID] AS [Id] ,[WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID] AS [CategoryId] ,[WAIVER_TYPE_CODE] AS [Code] ,[WAIVER_TYPE_SHORT_DESC] AS [ShortDescrip.on] ,[WAIVER_TYPE_DESC] AS [Descrip.on] ,[WAIVER_TYPE_CONDITIONS] AS [Condi.ons] ,[WAIVER_CODE] AS [WaiverCode] ,[WAIVER_LEVEL] AS [Level] ,[EXCEPTION_TO_POLICY] AS [IsPolicyExcep.on] ,IsAc.ve FROM [dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_TYPE]WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID] = @O.cerWaiverCategoryID
